allocations.name: Process sub-metering
allocations.description: Select if you track CHP generated electricity consumed by this process using a sub-meter

subtype.name: Single source sub-meter- This sub-meter only tracks electricity coming from CHP
Common sub-meter- This sub-meter tracks electricity coming from multiple sources (Requires allocation)

allocations.name: Allocation method
allocations.description: Select if you track total electricity generated by the CHP at the facility level and want to allocate it to this process on a percentage basis
